module AboutStateMachine
sig State {} -- simple states
sig StateMachine { -- composite state machines A: set State, -- set of states of a state machine i: A, -- initial state of a state machine F: set A, -- set of final states of a state machine R: A -> A -- transition relation of a state machine }
-- Claim that final states are never initial: False assert FinalNotInitial { all M: StateMachine | no M.i & M.F } check FinalNotInitial for 3 but 1 StateMachine
-- Is there a three-state machine with a non-final deadlock?: True pred AGuidedSimulation[M : StateMachine, s: M.A] { no s.(M.R) not s in M.F # M.A = 3 } run AGuidedSimulation for 3 but 1 StateMachine
